bibl.title: Who were the Alexandrians? Palace and City, Aristarchus and Comanus, 170-145 BC.
bibl.note: Offers a perspective on the life of city and royal court under Philometor and Physcon.

bibl.title: Ägypten zwischen innerem Zwist und äusserem Druck. Die Zeit Ptolemaios' VI. bis VIII. Internationales Symposion Heidelberg 16.-19.9.2007.

bibl.seg: McKECHNIE Paul, Who were the Alexandrians? Palace and City, Aristarchus and Comanus, 170-145 BC.

Andrea JÖRDENS und Joachim Friedrich QUACK (Hgg.), Ägypten zwischen innerem Zwist und äusserem Druck. Die Zeit Ptolemaios' VI. bis VIII. Internationales Symposion Heidelberg 16.-19.9.2007 = Philippika. Marburger altertumskundliche Abhandlungen. 45 (Wiesbaden, 2011) pp. 219-234.
Offers a perspective on the life of city and royal court under Philometor and Physcon.
